title: AddExceptionReference (Method)
text:
METHOD AddExceptionReference : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Adds a reference (to a BACnet-Calendar-Object) to the Exception_Schedule-Property of this BACnet-Object.

rows.Name: calendarInstance
rows.Comment: The instance number of the calendar object to reference.

rows:
The times and values during the calendar entries which
correspond to the exception date.
The number of times and values for the exceptions.
The priority with which the values are written.
